abstract: The 5.14-kilometer circuit, designed by the German architect and racetrack designer Hermann Tilke, will enable the fastest straight-line speed of any circuit in the world.
snippet: The 5.14-kilometer circuit, designed by the German architect and racetrack designer Hermann Tilke, will enable the fastest straight-line speed of any circuit in the world.

headline.main: At India's Formula One Track, a $400 Million Bet
